程序包 atu.input

类 PeopleList

java.lang.Object
atu.input.PeopleList
public class PeopleList
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to store the data of the csv file. It contains the data of the csv file and the methods to get the data. It also contains the methods to set the data.

  • 构造器概要

    This method is the constructor of the class PeopleList.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • PeopleList

      public PeopleList()
      This method is the default constructor of the class.

    • PeopleList

      public PeopleList​(float[] k1_energy, float[] k2_energy, int k3_trick1, int k3_trick2, int my_preference)
      This method is the constructor of the class PeopleList.
      参数:
      k1_energy - The array of the energy of the first trick.
      k2_energy - The array of the energy of the second trick.
      k3_trick1 - The number of the people who choose the k3 first trick.
      k3_trick2 - The number of the people who choose the k3 second trick.
      my_preference - The number of the people who prefer to do leader.
